import axios from'axios';// ** GET Mails
export var getMails=function getMails(params){return function(dispatch){return axios.get('/apps/email/emails',{params:params}).then(function(res){dispatch({type:'GET_MAILS',data:res.data,params:params});});};};// ** UPDATE Mails
export var updateMails=function updateMails(emailIds,dataToUpdate){return function(dispatch,getState){return axios.post('/apps/email/update-emails',{emailIds:emailIds,dataToUpdate:dataToUpdate}).then(function(res){dispatch({type:'UPDATE_MAILS',emailIds:emailIds,dataToUpdate:dataToUpdate,data:res.data});dispatch(getMails(getState().email.params));});};};// ** Update Mail Label
export var updateMailLabel=function updateMailLabel(emailIds,label){return function(dispatch,getState){return axios.post('/apps/email/update-emails-label',{emailIds:emailIds,label:label}).then(function(res){dispatch({type:'UPDATE_MAIL_LABEL',data:res.data});dispatch(getMails(getState().email.params));});};};// ** GET Next/Prev mail
export var paginateMail=function paginateMail(dir,emailId){return function(dispatch){return axios.get('/apps/email/paginate-email',{params:{dir:dir,emailId:emailId}}).then(function(res){dispatch({type:'PAGINATE_MAIL',data:res.data});});};};// ** SELECT Current Mail
export var selectCurrentMail=function selectCurrentMail(id){return function(dispatch){return axios.get('/apps/email/get-email',{id:id}).then(function(res){dispatch({type:'SELECT_CURRENT_MAIL',mail:res.data});});};};// ** SELECT Mail
export var selectMail=function selectMail(id){return function(dispatch){return dispatch({type:'SELECT_MAIL',id:id});};};// ** SELECT All Mails
export var selectAllMail=function selectAllMail(val){return function(dispatch){return dispatch({type:'SELECT_ALL_MAIL',val:val});};};// ** RESET Selected Mails
export var resetSelectedMail=function resetSelectedMail(){return function(dispatch){return dispatch({type:'RESET_SELECT_MAILS'});};};
